original_text: Because you did not obey the voice of the Lord and did not carry out his fierce wrath against Amalek, therefore the Lord has done this thing to you this day.
korean_text: 네가 여호와의 목소리를 순종하지 아니하고 그의 진노를 아말렉에게 쏟지 아니하였으므로 여호와께서 오늘 이 일을 네게 행하셨고

sentences.original_text: Because you did not obey the voice of the Lord
and did not carry out his fierce wrath against Amalek
therefore the Lord has done this thing to you this day.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 주께서 오늘 이 일을 네게 행하신 것이니라
